channel.title: One Question About Rsbot?
channel.description:
My account has been banned for quite some time now, almost 2 years, i'm just wondering when will it ever be unbanned & Will My Regular Stats Still Be There?
Should i still wait for this account too be unbanned, or just let go and make a new one?.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/o0sbd1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/28mk7ex.jpg[/img]

item.title: One Question About Rsbot?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Author wanted a lock.

Read full topic

item.title: One Question About Rsbot?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:11, topic:325988”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=422400.msg3100667#msg3100667 date=1263685193]
No, there was one time where all offences were removed from your account. But doesn’t a permanent ban mean PERMANENT? If they unban everyone that’s permanently banned after like a year then it isn’t permanent.
[/quote]
One of my accounts was ‘perm banned’ and Jagex unbanned it after a few months or so.[/quote]
Really? That’s hard to believe. At least it makes me feel safer boting.

Read full topic

item.title: One Question About Rsbot?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Telenim:

No, there was one time where all offences were removed from your account. But doesn’t a permanent ban mean PERMANENT? If they unban everyone that’s permanently banned after like a year then it isn’t permanent.

One of my accounts was ‘perm banned’ and Jagex unbanned it after a few months or so.

Read full topic

item.title: One Question About Rsbot?
item.dc:creator: @IceTICKER IceTICKER
item.description:
@IceTICKER wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:9, topic:325988”][quote author=IceTICKER link=topic=422400.msg3100658#msg3100658 date=1263684873]
My account has been banned for quite some time now, almost 2 years, i’m just wondering when will it ever be unbanned & Will My Regular Stats Still Be There?

Should i still wait for this account too be unbanned, or just let go and make a new one?.
[/quote]
Please don’t lie.

Macroing - 29 June 2009

Less then one year.[/quote]

Banned for 1 year, reports been up there since 2008

My mistake , but really why are you gunna try too correct me if you already know what i mean, trying too pull something out of your ass too talk about?

@Topic I’ve got everything understood so there will be no need to be replying too this at all.

Read full topic

item.description:

Still?
